title: Stable Diffusion UI

land-cre.ast-disc: File path to auto save your creations

home.status-ready: Stable Diffusion is ready to use!

in-paint.txt: In-Painting (select the area which the AI will paint into)

settings.live-preview: Show a live preview of the image (disable this for faster image generation)
settings.fix-face: Fix incorrect faces and eyes (uses GFPGAN)
settings.ups: Upscale the image to 4x resolution using:

preview-prompt.part1: Type a prompt and press the "Make Image" button.
preview-prompt.part2: You can set an "Initial Image" if you want to guide the AI.
preview-prompt.part3: You can also add modifiers like "Realistic", "Pencil Sketch", "ArtStation" etc by browsing through the "Image Modifiers" section and selecting the desired modifiers.
preview-prompt.part4: Click "Advanced Settings" for additional settings like seed, image size, number of images to generate etc.

advanced-settings.sound-disc: Will play a sound so user can hear when image is done.
advanced-settings.turbo-disc: Generates images faster, but uses an additional 1 GB of GPU memory
advanced-settings.gpu-disc: (for GPU-only. warning: this will consume more VRAM)
advanced-settings.beta-disc:
Get the latest features immediately (but could be less stable). 
Please restart the program after changing this.

storage.ast-disc: File path to auto save your creations
storage.cps-disc: Profiles will see suggestions from each other.
storage.acb-disc: A button will show up for images on hover

import.disc: It is a good idea to leave the exported file as it is. Otherwise it may not import correctly
import.disc:2: When importing, only profiles that are not already present on the will be added.

about:
If you found this project useful and want to help keep it alive, please to help cover the cost of development and maintenance! Thank you for your support!

Please feel free to join the discord community or file an issue if you have any problems or suggestions in using this interface.

Disclaimer: The authors of this project are not responsible for any content generated using this interface.

This license of this software forbids you from sharing any content that violates any laws, produce any harm to a person, disseminate any personal information that would be meant for harm,
spread misinformation and target vulnerable groups. For the full list of restrictions please read the license.

By using this software, you consent to the terms and conditions of the license.
